original_text: Then the Lord opened the mouth of the donkey, and she said to Balaam, “What have I done to you, that you have struck me these three times?”
korean_text: 여호와께서 나귀 입을 여시니 발람에게 이르되 내가 당신에게 무엇을 하였기에 나를 이같이 세 번을 때리느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord opened the mouth of the donkey
that you have struck me these three times?”
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 나를 이 세 번이나 때렸습니까?”
